Package ru.ashemchuk

Class Card

java.lang.Object
ru.ashemchuk.Card
public class Card extends Object
Represents a playing card from a standard 52-card deck. Each card has a suit, rank, and can be marked as a hole card (face down). This class is commonly used in card games like blackjack.

  • Method Details

    • withHole

      public Card withHole()
      Marks this card as a hole card (face down). Typically used for the dealer's second card in blackjack.
      Returns:
      this card instance with hole status set to true

    • open

      public Card open()
      Reveals a hole card by setting its hole status to false.
      Returns:
      this card instance with hole status set to false

    • getRank

      public Rank getRank()
      Returns the rank of this card.
      Returns:
      the rank of this card

    • downgrade

      public void downgrade()
      Downgrades an Ace card to its lower value. If this card is an Ace, its rank is changed to ACE_DOWNGRADED. This is typically used in blackjack when an Ace should be worth 1 instead of 11.

    • getIsHole

      public boolean getIsHole()
      Checks if this card is a hole card (face down).
      Returns:
      true if this card is a hole card, false otherwise

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Returns a string representation of this card. If the card is a hole card, returns "hole card". Otherwise, returns the card's display format including suit, rank, and point value.
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
      Returns:
      string representation of this card
